usage.cn: 永远不是一种距离,而是一种决定。
usage.eng: Eternity is not a distance but a decision.

usage.cn: 有时候一个小小的抉择就可以改变你的一生。(Keri Russell)
usage.eng: Sometimes it's the smallest decisions that can change your life forever.

usage.cn: 有的时候，很多事情根本无法解释清楚，你要做的就是跟随你的内心，并祈祷自己做出的选择是正确的。
usage.eng: Sometimes there are no explanations and all you have to do is follow your heart and hope you made the right decision.

usage.cn: 别在喜悦时许诺，别在忧伤时回答，别在愤怒时做决定。三思而后行。
usage.eng: Don't make promises when you are happy;don't answer when you are sad;don't make any decision when you are angry.Think twice before doing anything.
